experiment_name: Biocatalytic Generation of Trifluoromethyl Radicals by Nonheme Iron Enzymes for Enantioselective Alkene Difunctionalization
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:7.4;    reaction_other_conditions:Lysate (OD=40), 1 mM Fe(II), 50 mM sodium azide, 10 mM 1-trifluoromethyl-1,2-benziodoxol-3-(1H)-one, 3 hours, anaerobic conditions;    reaction_substrate_concentration:5 mM (4-methoxystyrene)
